snippet: A state judge on Friday refused a temporary injunction sought against state education officials in an effort to block application of the Common Core education standards.
abstract: Louisiana Judge Timothy Kelly refuses temporary injunction sought by 17 state legislators against state education officials in effort to block application of the Common Core education standards.
lead_paragraph: A state judge on Friday refused a temporary injunction sought against state education officials in an effort to block application of the Common Core education standards.

headline.main: Louisiana: Judge Denies Halt to School Standards
headline.print_headline: Louisiana: Judge Denies Halt to School Standards
